document.full_text: carlos beltran put on a rare display of might for a lineup that was missing ike davis and david wright, swatting three home runs, a career high, to lead the mets over the rockies.
document.title: mets 9, rockies 5: with 3 homers, beltran fills power void left by davis
lines_and_colors: carlos beltran put on a rare display of might for a lineup that was missing ike davis and david wright, swatting three home runs, a career high, to lead the mets over the rockies.
